entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued September 12 at 10:38AM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT DUE TO ELEVATED PARTICULATE MATTER LEVELS FROM WINDBLOWN DUST... The Imperial County APCD has issued an air quality alert due to increased particulate matter from blowing dust. The air quality alert is in effect now until 12 AM on Wednesday, September 13, 2023. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 3:56AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HEAT INDEX VALUES BETWEEN 105 AND 109 DEGREES ARE EXPECTED TODAY... The combination of expected air and dewpoint temperatures will result in maximum Heat Index values between 105 and 109 degrees inclusive today. In addition, Residents with outdoor activities planned are urged to drink plenty of water, wear light weight and light colored clothing and take frequent breaks from the heat.
